summary: Diff appears to implement a Plan-mode-only X-button behavior by introducing a Plan mode subview state in TaskManager and adding an optional `onPlanModeX` callback to BottomNavigation. Based on the provided summaries/snippets, the intent is to hide CustomLists and show Morning/Evening routines without changing the underlying app mode (to avoid flicker). No evidence of changes under `frontend/src/components/ui` or backend files is shown.
